description:
Tsubasa is cool, pretty, and liked by everyone. She spends her days doing karaoke and hanging out with her friends. Sure, her team was shut down by Haruma Hazeura. But what`s the point of even trying, anyway?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji ni Natte mo Imi Naishi ne
There`s No Point in Getting Serious
マジになっても意味ないしね
